statements: UPDATE health_records SET record_text = 'Updated record text' WHERE record_id = 1;

UPDATE health_records SET provider_id = 302, date_updated = '2022-10-16 09:45:00', date_created = '2022-10-15 10:00:00' WHERE patient_id = 202 AND record_id = 102;
